name: Circle of Nailuj's Evol
flavorText: Like the Great Cycle of Being, this ring has no beginning and no end. Named for its owner, the Master Necromancer Nailuj, it has aided many in their trials, and has been eagerly sought ever since.
flavorTextHtml: Like the Great Cycle of Being, this ring has no beginning and no end. Named for its owner, the Master Necromancer Nailuj, it has aided many in their trials, and has been eagerly sought ever since.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Damage Increased by [26.0 - 50.0]%

secondary.textHtml: You now raise an additional Skeletal Mage with each cast and they last an additional 4 seconds. (Necromancer Only) [2 - 4]
secondary.text: You now raise an additional Skeletal Mage with each cast and they last an additional 4 seconds. (Necromancer Only) [2 - 4]
